snippet: Dany Heatley, a 13-year N.H.L. veteran and a former rookie of the year, is now playing in the American Hockey League, where his younger teammates idolize Heatley and he is trying to make his case for rejoining the N.H.L.
abstract: Former NHL hockey star Dany Heatley, who is now playing in American Hockey League, has fully recovered from groin injury and will make one more attempt to return to NHL.
lead_paragraph: Dany Heatley, a 13-year N.H.L. veteran and a former rookie of the year, is now playing in the American Hockey League, where his younger teammates idolize Heatley and he is trying to make his case for rejoining the N.H.L.

headline.main: Former Star, Healthy Again, Adjusts to a Humbler Life in the Minors
headline.print_headline: Former Star, Healthy Again, Adjusts to a Humbler Life in the Minors
